scripts.bundle-my: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
scripts.bundle-auth: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file auth.index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/auth.index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
